user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and supportive bras that could accommodate my active lifestyle while also being suitable for everyday wear.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to this product primarily because of its all-cotton material, which I thought would provide comfort. However, I was disappointed with the performance as the band stretched out quickly, leading to a lack of support. This made it suitable only for casual wear at home.

I purchased this item because of the rave reviews highlighting its comfort and support. The initial fit was perfect, and after washing, it became even more comfortable. The price was also a significant factor, making it an attractive option for daily wear.

I chose this product based on its detailed description of comfort features, such as the Cool Comfort® cups and the TruSUPPORT® system. I appreciated the emphasis on breathability and support for my active lifestyle, which made it a logical choice for both workouts and daily activities.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer comfortable, well-fitting clothing that is easy to care for and maintains its quality after washing. I value items that have practical features, such as pockets and breathable materials, and I appreciate when products fit true to size without being overly tight or baggy. Additionally, I enjoy clothing that can be worn for various occasions, whether for work or casual outings. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that run large or small compared to their stated sizes, as well as those that wrinkle easily or lose their shape after use. I also prefer products that come well-packaged, as it adds to the overall shopping experience.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive bras that are suitable for my active lifestyle as well as for everyday wear. within my expected price range: [9.94, 19.99]
What specific features or characteristics are important to you in a bra for your active lifestyle and everyday wear?

Comfort and support are crucial for me when it comes to bras for my active lifestyle and everyday wear. I prefer bras that are made of breathable materials and have features like supportive bands and comfortable straps. Additionally, I value durability, so I look for bras that maintain their shape and support after washing. Pockets or convenient closures are a plus, and I prefer bras that fit true to size without being too tight or too loose.
What level of coverage do you prefer in bras for your active lifestyle and everyday wear?

I prefer bras with medium coverage for my active lifestyle and everyday wear. This type of coverage provides the right balance between support and freedom of movement, allowing me to stay comfortable and supported throughout the day.
What do you prefer in terms of the color or design of the bras for your active lifestyle and everyday wear?

I prefer bras in neutral colors like black, white, or nude for my active lifestyle and everyday wear. Simple designs without excessive detailing work best for me, as they are versatile and can be easily paired with different outfits. A subtle touch of feminine lace or a sleek seamless style would be nice, but overall, I lean towards practical and classic designs that offer both comfort and support.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire® bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex® Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's SmoothTec ComfortFlex Fit Wirefree Bra MHG199> / Item ID: B01HRFT6YQ / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Welcome to a wireless world where you never have to sacrifice comfort for support. Hanes® Smooth Comfort® wireless bra is brilliantly constructed for both. Carefully shaped foam cups and Hanes®' stay-in-place SmoothTec® band provide all the support you need, with the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that molds to your shape, not the other way around. One of the best features of this wirefree convertible bra is the Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This seamless, wireless bra provides full coverage with a flattering sweetheart neckline. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups and seamless construction that make this an ideal T-shirt bra. One more handy design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Women's Pure Comfort Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1274> / Item ID: B07S3LQ9NQ / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you thought it was impossible to find the support you need with the comfort you deserve, think again. JMS® presents their Pure Comfort® wireless, full-coverage bra that has everything you want in a bra. It starts with the remarkably comfortable yet effective light support, achieved with smartly engineered strategic support zones and a wider, no-roll knit underband for subtle under bust shaping. You'll love the convenience and ease of the front-close styling, with plush cushioning under the hook-and-eye panel for no-dig comfort. The seamless design gives you the sleek, smooth look you want under T-shirts and other clingy clothes. Wider straps and a built-up back help smooth away bulges even more. Plus, this wire-free tee shirt bra is made with moisture-wicking fabric that helps to keep you cool and dry all day. Made with 4-way stretch that moves effortlessly with you, there's a lot to love in this front-close wirefree bra from JMS."]
